title: I Want PBE Too T-T
body: I love trying new things and helping with stuff... but apparently there is alot of people in the waitng list... sigh... ill just keep dreaming... {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I appreciate your enthusiasm to help out and test new content, but we don't have a way to expedite the application.  If you are interesting in how PBE applicants are chosen, you can check out our[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ) in the meantime.  Hang in there!
